item.title: Outside of Jack Freedman House ( Flats 1 - 5 ), 15 Coverdale Road, NW2 4BE, 27th October
item.description:
The entrance to the residentsâ€™ car park is frequently blocked by parked vehicles because there are currently no yellow lines marking the access point. This persistent obstruction prevents residents from entering and exiting the car park safely and causes significant inconvenience. The developer - 196 Willesden Lane Limited, had already paid for the yellow lines to be installed as part of the planning or development agreement. However, these have not yet been implemented. Could you please confirm the current status of this installation and advise when the works are expected to be carried out? Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your response.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Coverdale Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
